definition: woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: The people who stood on the avenue tried to extinguish the fire, but it's of no avail.
sentences.chinese: 站在林荫道上的人们想熄灭大火，但不起作用。

sentences.english: Go for a walk in the mall on cold days.
At the avenue in the hospital, breeze is coming softly. It is quite suitable for patients to take a walk.
sentences.chinese: 医院的林荫道上，微风阵阵，很适合病人散步与休息。

sentences.english: At the avenue in the hospital, breeze is coming softly.It is quite suitable for patients to take a walk.
sentences.chinese: 医院的林荫道上，微风阵阵，很适合病人散步与休息。

sentences.english: One east-side resident plants her boulevard with beans and other vegetables for public picking.
sentences.chinese: 东边一个居民还在林荫道里种上了豆子，供众人采摘。

sentences.english: In the Tverskoy Boulevard some one shouted his name.
sentences.chinese: 在特韦尔林荫道上有个什么人喊了他一声。

sentences.english: He stands on the corner of a wide avenue.
sentences.chinese: 他站在宽阔的林荫道的角落里。

sentences.english: She sat at the window watching the evening invade the avenue .
sentences.chinese: 她坐在窗口，凝视着夜幕渐渐笼罩在林荫道上。

sentences.english: The wind roars up the avenue.
sentences.chinese: 风顺着林荫道呼啸而来。

sentences.english: Moorgate was nicknamed "the Avenue of the Americas".
sentences.chinese: Moorgate的绰号是“美洲的林荫道”。

sentences.english: They liked to walk in the avenue .
sentences.chinese: 他们喜欢在林荫道上漫步。

sentences.english: A tree-lined road leads to the site of Persepolis from the southwest.
sentences.chinese: 一条林荫道从西南方一直通向了波斯波利斯。

sentences.english: In the entrance stand many tall trees to form an avenue.
sentences.chinese: 入口处有许多高树，形成一条林荫道。

sentences.english: When I got to the school, he was running along the side of a long tree-lined street, all alone.
sentences.chinese: 但我发现他正一个人沿着长长的林荫道跑步呢。

definition: see 林陰大道|林阴大道[lin2 yin1 da4 dao4]
see 林蔭道|林荫道[lin2 yin4 dao4]
promenade/long hallway/Long Corridor in the Summer Palace, Beijing 北京頤和園|北京颐和园[Bei3 jing1 Yi2 he2 yuan2]
(of an area) to have trees with shade-giving foliage/(of a road) to be tree-lined
see 林蔭道|林荫道[lin2 yin4 dao4]
